summary: No one has ventured near the Locus of Malum in over one thousand years. Dare you brave its terrors and seek the Nightmare Shard?
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=6][b][center]THE NIGHTMARE SHARD[/center] [/b][/size][/color]


There are dark places in Nirn... One such place is the forgotten Locus of Malum. It is said that somewhere within the Locus of Malum's walls lies an unholy artifact that exists outside of space and time. The Nightmare Shard.

Many adventurers and heros have quested for the Nightmare Shard but only few have returned. Those that returned did so with broken minds, crippled with terror and insanity. Mumbling incoherantly, forever locked away in some dark corner of their own fractured mind. Fearful of the shards power everyone stopped questing for it and the Nightmare Shard fell into story and legend.

No one has ventured near the Locus of Malum in over one thousand years. Dare you brave its terrors and seek the Nightmare Shard?

Recommended for high level characters.

[color=#cc0000][size=4]------------
Features
------------[/size][/color]

New locations
New enemies
New NPC's
New weapons and armor
New items
2 New Shouts
1 huge main quest
8 side quests
Lots of other hidden stuff

Fully voice acted

Mod cleaned with TESVEdit

Fully Navmeshed (Using Creation Kit region auto generation and finalized with same method)

[color=#cc0000][size=4]-----------------
Requirements
-----------------[/size][/color]

Skyrim Latest Update
Dawnguard
[color=#cc0000][size=4]
------------------------------------
Installation/Starting the mod
------------------------------------[/size][/color]

For best results use a manual install (If you do use NMM when asked to replace files choose yes to everything)

1. Download the mod
2. Unpack the Rar archive (Winrar or 7 zip will do this)
3. Copy and paste everying to the ....Skyrim/Data/ directory
4. Run Skyrim Launcher
5. Click on Data files
6. Activate NightmareShard.esp by clicking on it (a tick will appear in the checkbox)
7. Run Skyrim and travel to The Locus of Malum (South of Gjukars Monument, map marker visible on world map)
8. Enjoy the mod!
